title: Beast Breathing
html:
The Beast Breathing (獣 (けだもの) の呼 (こ) 吸 (きゅう) , Kedamono no kokyū?) is a Breathing Style personally created and self-taught by Inosuke Hashibira after living in the mountains and fighting for survival. It is said to be distantly derived from the Wind Breathing.

The Beast Breathing enhances a user's sense of touch, and is a combination of a myriad of wild attacks that resemble the claws of a beast.

Contents

  • 1 Breathing Style Relationship Chart
  • 2 Techniques
  • 3 Users
  • 4 Demonstrations
  • 5 References

Techniques

  1. First Fang: Pierce (壱 (いち) ノ牙 (きば) 穿 (うが) ち抜 (ぬ) き, Ichi no kiba: Ugachi Nuki?)[1] - Inosuke stabs the target's neck with both blades.
  2. Second Fang: Rip and Tear (弐 (に) ノ牙 (きば) 切 (き) り裂 (さ) き, Ni no kiba: Kirisaki?)[2] - A double slash with his two blades in both diagonals (like X).[3]
  3. Third Fang: Devour (参 (さん) ノ牙 (きば) 喰 (く) い裂 (ざ) き, San no kiba: Kuizaki?)[4] - Simultaneous horizontal slashes towards the target's throat.
  4. Fourth Fang: Slice 'n' Dice (肆 (し) ノ牙 (きば) 切 (きり) 細 (こま) 裂 (ざ) き, Shi no kiba: Kiri Komazaki?)[5] - A multiple diagonal double slashes with both swords.
  5. Fifth Fang: Crazy Cutting (伍 (ご) ノ牙 (きば) 狂 (くる) い裂 (ざ) き, Go no kiba: Kuruizaki?)[6] - A technique which slices everything in all directions.
  6. Sixth Fang: Palisade Bite (陸 (ろく) ノ牙 (きば) 乱 (らん) 杭 (ぐい) 咬 (が) み, Roku no kiba: Ranguigami?)[7] - A simultaneous decapitation with his two swords from both directions.
  7. Seventh Form: Spatial Awareness (漆 (しち) ノ型 (かた) 空 (くう) 間 (かん) 識 (しき) 覚 (かく) , Shichi no Kata: Kūkan Shikikaku?)[8] - Inosuke can identify the position of enemies by feeling small disturbances in the air. This technique was so strong that Inosuke could sense all the demons spread out through a whole mountain.
  8. Eighth Fang: Explosive Rush (捌 (はち) ノ牙 (きば) 爆 (ばく) 裂 (れつ) 猛 (もう) 進 (しん) , Hachi no kiba: Bakuretsu Mōshin?)[9] - Inosuke charges towards his opponent while dual wielding, then he swings his blades to decapitate them.
  9. Ninth Fang: Extending Bendy Slash (玖 (く) ノ牙 (きば) 伸 (しん) ・うねり裂 (ざ) き, Ku no kiba: Shin - Unerizaki?)[10] - Inosuke dislocates the joints of his arm to increase the range of his attack.
  10. Tenth Fang: Whirling Fangs (拾 (じゅう) ノ牙 (きば) 円 (えん) 転 (てん) 旋 (せん) 牙 (が) , Jū no kiba: Enten Senga?)[11] - Inosuke spins his swords in a circular motion, deflecting enemy attacks.
  • Sudden Throwing Strike (思 (おも) いつきの 投 (な) げ裂 (さ) き, Omoitsuki no Nagesaki?)[12] - Inosuke throws both of his blades at an enemy.
